subject: Junit/Ant/Tinderbox
msgSnippet: I have a setup of a project using Ant automagically building and testing with Mozilla s tinderbox. I am trying to figure out the bext way to get the stacktrace
messageBody:
I have a setup of a project using Ant automagically building and
testing with Mozilla's tinderbox.

I am trying to figure out the bext way to get the stacktrace printed
out in the build log when a failure of error is detected. Is there
some special ant flag for junit that provided this function? Is there
another way to do it?

Thanks!
Jesse
